channel.title: [HELP]Hard Problem[317]
channel.description:
Ok, I add items, add them correctly,no space bar, using tabs, etc. But when I run server I get this error [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:115) [/code]
Here is what I was adding [code]item = 7810 Spirit_Shield A_Spirit_Shield! 68600 15000000 0 0 0 0 0 39 41 50 1 45 0 1 item = 7811 Arcane_Spirit_Shield A_Arcane_Spirit_Shield 68600 225000000 0 0 0 20 0 53 55 73 2 52 0 3 item = 7812 Elysian_Spirit_Shield A_Elysian_Spirit_Shield 68600 750000000 0 0 0 0 0 63 65 75 2 57 0 3 item = 7813 Spectral_Spirit_Shield A_Spectral_Spirit_Shield 68600 82000000 0 0 0 0 0 53 55 73 30 52 0 3 item = 7814 Divine_Spirit_Shield A_Divine_Spirit_Shield 68600 1230000000 0 0 0 0 0 63 65 75 2 57 0 3[/code]

item.title: [HELP]Hard Problem[317]
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Ok, I add items, add them correctly,no space bar, using tabs, etc. But when I run server I get this error

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:115)

Here is what I was adding

item = 7810 Spirit_Shield A_Spirit_Shield! 68600 15000000 0 0 0 0 0 39 41 50 1 45 0 1 item = 7811 Arcane_Spirit_Shield A_Arcane_Spirit_Shield 68600 225000000 0 0 0 20 0 53 55 73 2 52 0 3 item = 7812 Elysian_Spirit_Shield A_Elysian_Spirit_Shield 68600 750000000 0 0 0 0 0 63 65 75 2 57 0 3 item = 7813 Spectral_Spirit_Shield A_Spectral_Spirit_Shield 68600 82000000 0 0 0 0 0 53 55 73 30 52 0 3 item = 7814 Divine_Spirit_Shield A_Divine_Spirit_Shield 68600 1230000000 0 0 0 0 0 63 65 75 2 57 0 3
